text: Ra tiniharuko, paigambarale tiniharusita bhane ki allahale timra lagi ‘‘taluta’’ la'i (raja) niyukta gareko cha. Tiniharule bhane ki tyasala'i hamimathi sasana garne adhikara kasari huna sakdacha, rajasattako adhikari ta hami haum ra tyosamga ta dherai dhana sampatti pani chaina. Nabile bhane ki allahale tyasala'i timiharumathi cuneko cha tatha usala'i badhi jnana ra saririka sakti prasasta pradana gareko cha. Kuro yo cha ki allahale jasala'i cahancha rajagaddi pradana gardacha. Tyo sarvavyapi ra sarvajnata cha
